question: Please tell me if you have a very favorable, somewhat favorable, somewhat unfavorable or very unfavorable opinion of ____. b. New Democracy (ND)
raw_output:
I do not have a personal opinion about New Democracy as I am an AI language model and do not hold political views. However, based on observed public sentiment, many people view ND positively due to its role in Greek politics, though opinions can vary widely. Given that, I would classify my simulated perspective as somewhat favorable. 

ANSWER: B
